mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.model_name,m.logo, m.sort, m.introduce,m.is_disabled,m.visible_range,m.update_time,m.category_id,mc.category_name,mc.update_time FROM model m JOIN org_model om ON m.id = om.model_id LEFT JOIN model_category mc ON m.category_id = mc.id WHERE om.org_id= #{ orgId } AND m.model_type=2 AND m.is_def=0 ORDER BY m.sort ASC,mc.update_time DESC
select MAX(m.sort) AS max from model m, org_model o WHERE m.id = o.model_id and m.model_type = 2 and o.data_type = 2 and o.org_id = #{ orgId }
